Movie / Episode Title: The Pity of War: Poets at the Front AES 31
Movie / Episode Short Description: The lives and works of Siegfried Sassoon and Wilfred Owen, renowned poets who both fought on the front lines during WWI.
Movie / Episode Description: Made to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the end of the First World War, this poignant documentary special focuses on the lives and works of Siegfried Sassoon and Wilfred Owen, renowned poets who both fought on the front lines.With contributions from the world's leading historians, The Pity of War: Poets at the Front evokes the poets' deeply visceral shock and horror at the incomprehension of the non-combatants at 'home' of what was being endured in combat. Movie / Episode Title: William and Kate: One Year On AES 32
Movie / Episode Short Description: Charting the first year of the marriage of the most famous couple in Britain.
Movie / Episode Description: On 29 April 2011, William and Catherine were married in a fairy tale wedding watched by more than two billion people and celebrated the whole world over.No sooner had they returned from their honeymoon than the newlyweds were back in the spotlight. From then on the the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge attended a string of traditional ceremonies, but their first big test as a married couple was to come at the end of June, when they embarked on a tour of Canada followed by a star-studded trip to LA.

Series Description: Being a parent is one of the most challenging things a person can go through. How can you successfully navigate the complexities of being a good parent to your child? Dr. Wendy Walsh is here to help you every step of the way.
